overview:
A tenacious entrepreneur that started bootstrapping companies at age 18.

He began freelancing as a web and UI designer, and incorporated Limewheel Creative in 2006 to provide a vehicle to hire staff, contractors and take on larger projects.

From there, he met Aleksey Bobkov and they collaborated on several projects including a couple of eCommerce websites. Neither of them were happy with the eCommerce solutions available, and felt their clients, and them as web developers were not being adequately served a high quality and flexible product.

A product was born. Aleksey and Danny decided to Co-Found LemonStand, and work toward the vision of providing a high quality, super flexible and easy to use eCommerce platform, that includes a vibrant developer eco-system.
